properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 8:28PM EST until January 22 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in
Georgia...

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville.
* From tomorrow morning until late Tuesday night.
* At 745 PM Friday the stage was 18 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 20 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday morning
then continue rising, reaching near 21.5 feet by Sunday
afternoon. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage by
Tuesday evening.
* At 18 feet, timberlands are beginning to flood along the river.

At 19 feet, the river begins to cover Riverside Drive and cutoff
residents from their homes.

Between 20 to 21.5 feet, minor flooding of roads begins on the south
side of Hawkinsville along Gooseneck Lane. With the flooding of
Gooseneck Lane, residents are cutoff from reaching their homes.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until late Tuesday night
